confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?
addProviderSuccess: Add successfully, please configure the provider information in the right panel
batchSizeBaiduTips: Batch size is the number of sentences translated at a time. If the number is too large, it may cause translation failure. The maximum value is 18.
batchSizeVolcTips: Batch size is the number of sentences translated at a time. If the number is too large, it may cause translation failure. The maximum value is 16.
batchSizeAzureTips: Batch size is the number of sentences translated at a time. If the number is too large, it may cause translation failure. The maximum value is 1000.
batchSizeAliyunTips: Batch size is the number of sentences translated at a time. If the number is too large, it may cause translation failure. Recommended value is 15.
endpointAliyunTips: Aliyun machine translation service domain, default is mt.aliyuncs.com, usually no need to modify.
systemPromptTips:
System prompt, supports variables:
${sourceLanguage} Source language
${targetLanguage} Target language
${content} Source subtitle
userPromptTips:
User prompt, supports variables:
${sourceLanguage} Source language
${targetLanguage} Target language
${content} Source subtitle
ollamaApiUrlTips: Local Ollama API address, please use the chat interface, usually http://localhost:11434/api/chat
DeerApiUrlTips: Get API keys with lightning-fast speeds at incredibly low prices. Easy top-up via Alipay/WeChat Pay. Visit DeerAPI to apply!
googleApiKeyTips: Google Cloud Translation API key, can be obtained from Google Cloud Console
batchSizeGoogleTips: Google Translate batch size, recommended under 50 to avoid request limits
customParametersTip: Configure additional headers and body parameters for this provider
structuredOutputTips:
Select the structured output type supported by your AI service provider:
• Disabled - No structured output, model returns content freely
• JSON Object - Standard JSON object format (suitable for DeepSeek, Qwen, etc.)
• JSON Schema - Strict JSON schema validation (suitable for OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Gemini, etc.)

Different AI providers support different structured output types. Selecting the wrong type may cause translation failures.
doubaoApiKeyTips: Doubao Translation API Key, can be obtained from Volcano Ark Console
doubaoModelNameTips: Doubao translation model name, default is doubao-seed-translation-250915, usually no need to modify
batchSizeDoubaoTips: Doubao translation batch size, due to API limits, recommended to set to 1
